name: LingoAssist
0:
”Alexa, ask Lingo Assist to say Hello”
”Alexa, ask Lingo Assist to set the language to Japanese”
”Alexa, ask Lingo Assist to translate Which way to the train station?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: lingo assist
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Simply ask Lingo Assist to translate an English word or phrase to a different language. It's a fun way to learn new words and phrases in different languages, expand your knowledge and practice your pronouciation. If you have an Amazon Echo Show, Amazon Echo Spot, any Alexa device supporting a display, or the Alexa App for iOS or Android then you can also practice reading the translation too.

As of September 2018, Lingo Assist currently supports a growing range of languages: 
 → French
 → German
 → Italian
 → Mandarin
 → Portuguese
 → Japanese
 → Spanish
 → Turkish

Get started by saying "Ask Lingo Assist to say Hello" and if you want to hear the translation again, just say "repeat".

To set the language, just say: "Ask Lingo Assist to use Japanese".

What language do you want to try today?
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
